articles.content:
Paek Nam Sun meets delegation of foreign ministry of Brunei Darussalam
    Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, minister of foreign affairs of the DPRK, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Foreign Ministry of Brunei Darussalam led by permanent secretary Pehin Dato Lim Jock Seng who paid a courtesy visit to him today.
